name: Kumo Kickstarter playtest (not the full demo)
name_original: Kumo Kickstarter playtest (not the full demo)
description:
This is the Playtest demo for the Exploration Puzzle Based Kumo as you take a journey of a young boy in a long above the clouds discovering the past of an ancient kingdom.  Download the Windows executable below. Gamepad Compatibility coming soon.

Please keep in mind this is just a Paytest Demo. This means certain features such as most puzzles and flying couldn't be added due to Development, and certain things may not be as polished as I would like. I hope you like Kumo and I appreciate all feedback or just speaking to you wonderful people in general.

How can you support?

  • Twitter Follow the development everyday!
  • Discord Come and interact with me directly and in real time
  • Facebook dont have discord or twitter? then hey come and follow on facebook!
  • Even buy me a coffee if you would like to <3
